name: postershop
description: A minimalist ecommerce site that sells **posters**. Built for QA exercises and e2e testing. - Frontend: React + Redux Toolkit + React Router + Vite (**TypeScript**) - Backend: Express + PostgreSQL + Sessions (**TypeScript**) - Auth: Local email/password (bcrypt). No OIDC. - DB: PostgreSQL (Docker compose included) - Payments: Simulated checkout with validation
